action.description: Opens the Android virtual device (AVD) manager which manages emulator images and snapshots
Move classes and their associated resources to another module
Pull out style-related attributes from layout and extract them as a new style
Extract one or more views into a separate layout
Replaces attributes by Android style reference where possible
Submit feedback to the Android Studio team
Adds a new data sample file
Add "Gradle-aware Make" launch task to Android Run Configuration(s) if it is missing
